product_name: Picnic At Ascot Travel Picnic Set for Four
long_description: Invite some friends and bring along your Picnic At Ascot Travel Picnic Set for Four for a classy outdoor meal with all the accoutrements of your dinner table. Durable canvas case with convenient front pocket and carry handles zips open to reveal a beautifully organized and secured array of useful picnic essentials. Picnic set contains 4 melamine plates, 4 acrylic wine glasses, 4 sets of stainless-steel cutlery and 4 cotton napkins. Also includes a cheese knife, 6 x 5 in. hardwood cutting board with juice groove, stainless-steel corkscrew and wooden salt and pepper shakers. Plates, cutlery and glasses are top-rack dishwasher safe; cutting board should be washed and dried by hand; napkins are machine washable.
short_description: Invite some friends and bring along your Picnic At Ascot Travel Picnic Set for Four for a classy outdoor meal with all the accoutrements of your dinner table.
